Virtual care and your workplace

Building a strong workplace culture starts with investing in the health of your employees. Here are some of the top reasons to offer virtual care to your employees.

Read more
  • News

Shoppers Drug Mart makes $75 million investment in Maple

Shoppers Drug Mart is investing $75 million in Maple, the leading virtual care provider in Canada, providing new ways for Canadians to get access to care. 

Read more
  • Blog

Why you need to rethink your health benefits package

Health and wellness have been at the centre of the world’s attention since the start of COVID-19.

Read more
  • Blog

Six tips for bringing your staff back to the office safely

It’s been a hard adjustment for Canadians to stay at home 24/7. We’ve put together some helpful tips on how to bring your team back to the office.

Read more
  • Blog

Tips for small businesses coping with COVID-19

Nearly every small business owner has wondered if they’ll be able to weather the COVID-19 storm, or if permanent closure would be better.

Read more
  • Blog

How to get the flu shot during COVID-19

Usually, the seasonal flu is the most of our health worries come fall and wintertime. This year, it’s more important than ever that Canadians get their flu shot. But where should you go for a flu shot if you’re working from home?

Read more
  • Blog

Telemedicine benefits for employers and employees

The most competitive businesses rely on finely-tuned processes driven by a healthy and happy workforce. Without competitive healthcare benefits, it’s hard to create a winning workplace where talent can flourish. Here’s why virtual care is a game changer for employers and employees.

Read more
  • Blog

How technology is helping seniors gain access to healthcare

The increasing number of older adults presents many challenges for the Canadian healthcare system. Learn how technology, like virtual care, is helping our more senior population.

Read more
  • Blog

Virtual meetings, the new reality? How to improve communications with your team

Virtual meetings held over video chat platforms have become a daily reality for many workers. Here are some ways you can improve communication among your team.

Read more
  • Blog

How to improve mental health in the workplace.

Workplaces play an essential role in nurturing positive mental health. Most adults spend more of their waking hours at work than anywhere else.

Read more
  • Blog

How companies can support employees with chronic illnesses

Chronic illnesses are long-term conditions that are a part of an employee’s daily life. Here are some ways to support your employees with chronic illness.

Read more
  • Blog

Shaping the future of life insurance through digital disruption

In light of a global health crisis, Canadians feel more vulnerable. One way Canadians are protecting themselves and their loved ones is with life insurance.

Read more
  • Blog

What to know about COVID-19 vaccine and your workforce

The development of a COVID-19 vaccine in less than a year was an incredible achievement. Here are some important elements to consider as your organization prepares for a return to the office.

Read more
  • Blog

7 ways to help reduce anxiety of your staff while working from home

As an employer, it’s important to be mindful of the impact COVID-19 is having on your employees’ mental health. You can do a lot to create a positive, supportive working environment. Here are some ways to help your staff.

Read more
  • Blog

How to develop a wellness strategy for your workplace

Creating a top-tier company culture starts with the simple truth – invest in people. A team that is healthy, happy, and secure operates like a well-oiled machine. Learn how you can develop a wellness strategy for your company.

Read more
  • Blog

Why are young workers so stressed out?

Employees are human beings. Despite their best attempts, many employees carry the weight of their mental health alongside their work responsibilities. Learn about why the younger population is stressed out.

Read more
  • Blog

How chronic pain impacts the workplace

When it comes to the workplace, chronic pain follows employees throughout their day, making small tasks seem outsized in effort. Learn about how chronic pain impacts our employees, and your workplace.

Read more
  • Blog

7 things you can do to improve the health and wellness for your employees

Even if your staff is putting on a cheery face, make no mistake – today’s conditions are still causing a strain on their mental and physical health. Employers need to give back to their staff’s health and wellness. Here are some tips to help.
